resources:
BeRoads Settings fr Favorites Ajouter aux favoris Retirer des favoris Partager avec: Téléchargez gratuitement l\'application Android BeRoads: Appui long sur un élément pour l\'ajouter/supprimer des favoris.
Glissez votre doigt depuis le bord gauche du téléphone pour faire apparaitre le menu.
Astuce: glissez de droite à gauche pour trier les caméras suivant d\'autres critères
Tri alphabétique Tri par distance
- Geofence 1 Geofence 2 Latitude Longitude Clear geofence 1 Clear geofence 2 Clear all geofences Clear stored geofences Radius - Add Geofences: Success GeofenceRequestIds=%1$s Add Geofences: Failure, error code %1$d GeofenceRequestIds=%2$s Can\'t add geofences, previous request hasn\'t finished. Client connected Connection failed Client disconnected Missing value Invalid latitude(s). Must be in the range -90 to 90 degrees Invalid longitude(s). Must be in the range -180 to 180 degrees Invalid radius(s). Must be 1 meter or greater. Entered Geofence transition error, code %1$d message %2$s. Exited Geofence transition error. Invalid type %1$d in geofences %2$s Click notification to return to app %1$s geofence(s) %2$s Unknown transition Invalid action received. See error log for details. Invalid action %1$s received. Invalid integer request ID: %1$s Latitude should be in the range -90 to 90 degrees Longitude should be in the range -180 to 180 degrees Google Play services: unable to resolve connection error. Location Services is available Radius must be greater than or equal to 0 Register geofence Removing geofences by request id failed: error code %1$d GeofenceRequestIds=%2$s Can\'t remove geofences, previous request hasn\'t finished. Removing geofences by request ids succeeded: request ids: %1$s Removing all geofences failed: error code %1$d Removing all geofences succeeded. entered exited unknown --Unknown-- Received an unknown activity request code %1$d in onActivityResult.
